page.title: 08JIM`S BUTCHER SHOP,BROUGHTON
page.content: ON 26th JUNE, WE WENT DOWN TO INTERVIEW THE PEOPLE WHO WORK AT THE BUTCHERÂ£S SHOP ON THE HIGH STREET IN BROUGHTON. THIS IS WHAT WE FOUND OUT.THEY GET A LOT OF CUSTOMERS BUT THEY WOULD LIKE EVEN MORE.THE PRESENT OWNER HAS OWNED THE SHOP FOR FOUR YEARS.IT OPENS AT 8.00a.m. AND CLOSES AT 5.00p.m. TWO PEOPLE WORK THERE:THE BUTCHER AND HIS WIFE.THEY SELL GROCERIES AS WELL AS MEAT AND VEGETABLES.PEOPLE BUY BEEF,SUGAR AND MILK THE MOST.FRIDAY IS THE BUSIEST DAY.WEDNESDAY IS THE WORST DAY FOR TRADE. THE BUTCHERÂ£S WIFE DOES NOT LIKE GETTING MESSY AND HANDLING LIVER BECAUSE IT IS SLIMY.THEY LIKE WORKING IN A SHOP BECAUSE THEY ENJOY MEETING ALL THE PEOPLE.THEY ONLY GET BORED WHEN THEY ARE NOT BUSY.
